version_description: • Bug fixes and stability improvements
• Fixed user dictionary bug

• Gboard now works in Vietnamese.
• With new typing suggestions, Gboard can do math and unit conversions for you. Try typing 91+25 or 5 kg to see it in action!
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• Gboard now supports Norwegian!
• Gboard now supports Arabic, Persian, and Hebrew!

• Now with a tap of the G button, you’ll have access to both Maps and YouTube, making it easier than ever to share location and video content.
• The new Ink feature lets you draw and share your creations right from your keyboard. To start drawing, just

* Make your own GIFs by tapping on the Emoji key, then the GIF tab and finally Make a GIF. Record your GIF, draw on it, add emojis, and then share it with your friends!
* Persian support has been added to the iPad.
* Fixed disappearing voice input

Use Gboard with one hand! -- we've added one-handed mode to make it easier than ever to text and search when you're on-the-go! To try it, long-press on the globe icon and tap one-handed mode.
Gboard now supports Japanese - including 12 keys, QWERTY, a

We’ve fixed the issue that prevented auto-correction and glide-typing
We’ve added an emoji shortcut! To more easily access GIFs and Ink, just long press on the emoji icon and toggle to the GIF or pen icon
Other bug fixes and performance improvem
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Gboard now supports Traditional Chinese!
The default Gboard theme will automatically darken in dark-mode apps.
Gboard now supports Korean!
Gboard now supports Korean!

In this version we have:

● Long press misspelled suggestions to remove them from the dictionary.
● Added support for the following languages:
○ Hindi
○ Hindi (Transliteration)
○ Hinglish

Gboard fans, thank you for your continued support! We're always squashing bugs and improving performance, and, of course, delivering cool new features.

In this version, we have:

- Still using text emoticons like :) instead of emojis? Type yo
Gboard fans, thank you for your continued support! We're always squashing bugs and improving performance, and, of course, delivering cool new features.

Gboard fans, thank you for your continued support! We're always squashing bugs and improving performance, and, of course, delivering cool new features.

In this version, we have:

​• ​We've added a new feature to the MAKE A GIF flow: Now you

Gboard fans, thank you for your continued support! We're always squashing bugs and improving performance, and,
of course, delivering cool new features.

In this version, we have:

● Added support for the following languages:
○ Latvia

In this version we have:

● Added the QWERTZ keyboard layout for Czech.
● Added support for the following languages:
○ French (Belgium)
○ French (Switzerland)
○ German (Switzerland)
○ Icelandic
○ Macedonian

In this version we have:

● Swipe up or long press on the top row to quickly type a number
● Make conversations more fun with emoticons! (ò_ó ) ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
● Added support for the following languages:
○ Azerbaijani
○ Malte

In this version we have:

● Long press misspelled suggestions to remove them from the dictionary.
● Added support for the following languages:
○ Hindi
○ Hindi (Transliteration)
○ Hinglish

In this version, we have:

● Stickers! You can share awesome stickers straight from Gboard!
● Camera effects for MAKE A GIF! There are six new effects you can choose from -- go to the camera by tapping on the camera icon and tap the new camera e

In this version, we have:

● Added support for the following languages:
○ English (South Africa)
○ English (Nigeria)
○ English (Kenya)
○ English (Philippines)
○ Belarusian
○ Welsh

In this version, we have:
● Added three fun new camera effects for MAKE A GIF!
● Added support for the following languages:
○ Hausa

In this version, we have:
● Morse keyboard.
● Dvorak and Colemak layouts for English keyboards.

In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:
● Dvorak and Colemak layouts for the English keyboard.
● Morse keyboard.
● Added several new fun camera effects for MAKE A GIF!
● Added s

In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:
● Dvorak and Colemak layouts for the English keyboard.
● Morse keyboard.
● Added several new fun camera effects for MAKE A GIF!
● Added s

In this version, we have:
● Your minis: Stickers based on you. Create and customize minis inspired by your photos, and share them in any app.
● Added support for the following languages:
○ Estonian
○ Zulu

In this version, we have:

● You can now type in multiple languages without having to change the language! Just add the languages you
want via the Gboard app then start typing or swiping!
*Not all languages are supported.
● Improved voice t

In case you missed some of our recent features, here's what Gboard has added in the last few updates:

• Your minis: Stickers based on you. Create and customize minis inspired by your photos, and share them in any app.
• You can now type in multi

這個版本的更新內容如下：
• 新增有趣的相機效果，讓你輕鬆製作 GIF！
• 針對 iOS 12 修正錯誤及提升執行效能

為了不讓你錯過任何最新功能，以下列出 Gboard 在最近幾次更新中新增的功能：
• 你的迷你人物：以你為藍本的貼圖。根據你的相片建立及自訂迷你人物，不論你想透過什麼應• 用程式分享這些貼圖都沒問題。
• 現在你可以直接輸入不同語言的文字，不必變更語言設定！只要透過 Gboard 應用程式新增需要的語言，再以按鍵或滑動方式輸入即可。

版本更新：
• 針對 iOS 12 修正錯誤及提升執行效能

為了不讓你錯過任何最新功能，以下列出 Gboard 在最近幾次更新中新增的功能：
• 你的迷你人物：根據你的形象製作的貼圖。根據你的相片建立及自訂迷你人物，不論你想透過什麼應用程式分享這些貼圖都沒問題。
• 你現在可以直接輸入不同語言的文字，不必變更語言設定！只要透過 Gboard 應用程式新增需要的語言，再以按鍵或滑動方式輸入即可。
*不支援部分語言。
• 改良語音輸入體驗。
• 新增有趣的相

In this version we have:
• Fixes for voice input, Make-A-GIF and a few other features.
• 修正錯誤並提升執行效能
• 修復了語音輸入，Make-A-GIF和其他一些功能。

這個版本的更新內容如下：
• 改良主題：推出更優質的 Gboard 自訂主題，提供多種全新自訂選項！不論是背景顏色，還是滑行輸入軌跡的粗細，皆可輕鬆更改。此外，還新增了美觀的漸層主題供你挑選！
*並非所有主題選項都適用於某些中文和日文鍵盤佈局。

為了讓你不錯過任何最新功能，以下列出 Gboard 在最近幾次更新中新增的功能：
• 你的迷你人物：以你為藍本的貼圖。根據你的相片建立及自訂迷你人物，不論你想透過什麼應用程式分享這些貼圖都沒問題。
• 你現在可以直接輸入不同

這個版本的更新內容如下：
• 針對主題和翻譯功能修正錯誤並提升效能

為了不讓你錯過任何最新功能，以下列出 Gboard 在最近幾次更新中新增的功能：
• 改进了主题背景：Gboard 自定义主题背景比以往更加出色，并且增加了许多新的自定义选项！从背景颜色到滑行痕迹粗细，一切皆可更改。此外，还新增加了精美的渐变主题背景供您选择！
• 你的迷你人物：以你為藍本的貼圖。根據你的相片建立及自訂迷你人物，不論你想透過什麼應用程式分享這些貼圖都沒問題。
• 你現在可以直接輸入不

這個版本的更新內容如下：
• 支援阿爾巴尼亞文
• 為「MAKE A GIF」新增相機效果！

為了不讓你錯過任何最新功能，以下列出 Gboard 在最近幾次更新中新增的功能：
• 你的迷你人物：以你為藍本的貼圖。根據你的相片建立及自訂迷你人物，不論你想透過什麼應用程式分享這些貼圖都沒問題。
• 你現在可以直接輸入不同語言的文字，不必變更語言設定！只要透過 Gboard 應用程式新增需要的語言，再以按鍵或滑動方式輸入即可。
*不支援部分語言。
• 改善語音
